questions.question:
A flat plate 1m wide and 1.5m long is to be maintained at 94oC in air with free steam temperature of 10oC blowing along 1.5m side of plate. Find heat transfer coefficient. Take the following air properties at mean temperature.
ρ = 1.0877
K = 0.028 w/m-k
CP = 1007 J/Kg-k
Pr = 0.703
μ = 2.029*10-5 Kg/m-s
$$ h = \frac{Q}{A \Delta T} $$

A flat plate 1m wide and 1.5m long is to be maintained at 94oC in air with free steam temperature of 10oC blowing along 1.5m side of plate. Determine the velocity of air required to have rate of energy dissipation of 4.41KW. Take the following air properties at mean temperature.
ρ = 1.0877
K = 0.028 w/m-k
CP = 1007 J/Kg-k
Pr = 0.703
μ = 2.029*10-5 Kg/m-s
$$ V = \frac{R_e \mu}{\rho L} $$
